website_summaries.verdict: In spite of a few known issues, this portable air conditioner has more to offer than others on our list, and offers versatile functions for use in both warm and cold seasons.
pros: Distances itself from others models for also including a heater function
Rated to cool spaces up to about 550 sq
ft. thanks to the 14,000 BTU capacity
Some owners rave about it cooling rooms as large as 700 sq
ft. Has a user-friendly digital display and remote control
cons: Some problems with the fan malfunctioning have been logged

customer_reviews.title: This model is not as good as 2 cheaper Honeywells. I own 3 of them.
customer_reviews.text: This Honeywell does not work as well as the Honeywell MN10CESWW or the MN12CES model in black and silver, which are both steller work horses for $350 and $399, respectively. This new model is pricey at $600, and has a new, less-good, way of drawing air into the unit. They basically messed up their already-excellent design and made it less horsepower, less cooling, and more expensive. Buy the other models I mention above and I promise you'll be cooler and happier.
customer_reviews.author: Anotherperson

customer_reviews.title: This may not be the one you want!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at the reviews and was not surprised that it would not cool a garage in PHX to freezing temps. On a 106 day it will keep a my garage around 90 degrees. That was no surprise, by what was, is the cost of electricity to run it. At .16 kwh running 24hrs it cost $3.85. This unit almost doubled my monthly energy bill for the month. So if you plan buying be aware of what I have found out. I will only use for short periods of time. Also one wall and garage door , and attic not insulated.
customer_reviews.author: Kip T.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised and a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works great - a little less airflow than I anticipated but it blows air at about 25 degrees below the intake temperature. Exhaust venting can be very warm to the touch but not dangerously hot... We use this to cool the entrance of our building to help the central AC keep up on really hot days.
customer_reviews.author: TJ C

customer_reviews.title: I use this to cool a normal sized bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I use this to cool a normal sized bedroom. It easily knocks the temp down from 80 degrees to 68 in under an hour. It's a bit on the loud side, but I don't mind the white noise while I'm trying to get to sleep. Beats sweating!
customer_reviews.author: Basil Margherita

customer_reviews.title: Too loud for an apartment complex. Expensive & poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Cons - Loud (like a dryer in my living room) - Vibrates (worse than a dryer - probably super annoying for my downstairs neighbors) - Window bracket (~48 inches) was too small for my windows/doors (~58+ inches) - Larger window bracket is super expensive ($80-$100) and has bad reviews Pros - Probably cools the air OK if you can tolerate the above Also, keep in mind this is a big, heavy, fragile object that qualifies as hazardous waste. If you have a similar experience to mine and want to get rid of it, you are going to have a bad time.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Gyde

customer_reviews.title: don't buy as a heat source
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy for heat unless you just want to supplement a room that is a little too cold. Won't heat at all if temperature is below 50 or 55 degrees in the area you want to warm. Haven't used for cooling yet. I live in pacific northwest, and it has to be drained of condensation quite quickly. It does shut off before it overflows the drain pan, but the drain outlet is virtually at floor level so the entire unit has to be lifted or moved to a stairway to put a pan under it for draining.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Honeywell makes a splash
customer_reviews.text: Honeywell worked real good when got it. Now it doesn’t want to heat as good. Going to leave it unplugged for a day and see how it works. If it doesn’t I will contact vendor and see what can be done. My other one works like a charm. I will be back to rate it again when I contact vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: no sweat
customer_reviews.text: we needed one 14,000 btu for our front room in central arizona . So not to overload it in the summer we installed 2 of them side by side. we run an evaporative cooler all we can but when its no longer effective we turn off the evaporative cooler, turn on both of these black/silver honeywells 14,000 btu until the room temperature starts to become uncomfortably cold, then we turn one of them off and the one remaining can maintain our comfort zone. we do alternate them at times . both units went into service about July 20th 2017 and both are still running well.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly A.  illiams

customer_reviews.title: ... smaller one that is a different brand that doesn't cool as large a space but that I like better
customer_reviews.text: I have a smaller one that is a different brand that doesn't cool as large a space but that I like better. The reason is that THIS one doesn't shut off when the temperature is reached, it continues to blow air without the compressor running. The other one totally goes off and doesn't waste electricity.
customer_reviews.author: Spirit Kat 999

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 10000 Honeywell in 2014 to cool a 500 sq. ft. uninsulated garage. It did a fair job. It ran constantly, it would keep it 69 in the morning and 72 in the afternoon. You need to keep the garage door closed as much as possible. This unit will keep the garage 69 with outside temp 98. I don't have to think about going in and out of garage. I've never turned the fan speed up from low. Unit cuts on and off in the heat of the day. Unit has 3 filters where the old unit had one. Only time will tell if it lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: CompCrazy

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Got this AC for my bedroom. Worked great all throughout the summer. I leave it plugged in everyday. After 1 month of having it plugged in and not using it, it started smelling like something burning. I am scared of even running it and causing a fire. For the price you would think that it should be fine leaving it plugged in. wouldn't recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Sadly just weak
customer_reviews.text: It makes lots of cold air, blows well but the single bedroom I put it in just does not get cooler. It runs and runs and the temp just goes up and up all day long. Start it in the morning on warmer days to get ahead and still no luck. Agreed the Honeywell model 12 is better. I would not recommend this one tho. Pretty quiet, just air noise. Hose falls off if you touch it so it is really not maneuverable.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased! It was so easy to set-up. I still have a screen in the window. No problem. I did need to have someone to bring the unit into the house but now I can put it in a closet for the winter and reinstall in the spring all by myself. This replaced a window unit which blocked the window view, was very loud, I needed to regularly empty the water pan and have someone install or remove.. Now I can sit across the room from the unit to control it, still have a window view, do not need to deal with water and I can install or remove the unit by myself!
customer_reviews.author: jestsat

customer_reviews.title: AC unit doesn't last long 1-3 months is all we got out of 2 units
customer_reviews.text: AC unit lasted 2 months before grinding to a halt. Even then it was struggling to blow cold air and cycled on and off constantly. Called for replacement and the process was not timely nor easy. Took about 2 weeks for them to decide to send a new unit which took another week to deliver. So 3 weeks out without an AC unit. The second unit lasted about 1 month before similar grinding and noises have made us purchase another type of AC unit. Not impressed one bit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely garbage quality product very loud noise and not cooling
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely trash .. loud noise it’s not cooling and came in 2 days later than expected .. also damaged box..... unit sounds like an helicopter very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Saqib M Malik

customer_reviews.title: Improve the packaging
customer_reviews.text: The first portable A/C unit Amazon sent came damaged, when plugged in it would start then stop a few minutes later. After reading the trouble guide we were unable to make it work properly. The packaging was inadequate to protect the unit and the box was dented in several places. The unit had a hole punched in it beneath one of the dents. That said, Amazon sent a replacement unit within a few days, again box was dented but no physical damage to the unit. Upon starting it up the unit ran perfectly. We have used it everyday since and very happy with the units ability to cool.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Davison

customer_reviews.title: Buy something different
customer_reviews.text: Air conditioning works fine the DE humidifier does not seem to work at all I get maybe after 2 weeks a 1/2 a cup of water from it to me that's just a joke my Humidity levels stays around 70% which is too high
customer_reviews.author: Timothy golden

customer_reviews.title: Might buy a second one.
customer_reviews.text: I have a huge lake house, built in the 70s with only 1 central air unit. The upstairs is always hot and the basement freezing, even with all the downstairs vents shut off. I was considering getting a mini split installed, but decided to try this first. The difference was almost instant, I can finally stop running the central AC to 62 degrees just to keep the bedroom at 75. I'm considering getting 1 or 2 more and shutting off the central system all together.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN UPON ARRIVAL!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My A/C went out in my house and i bought this thinking it would help make up for the lost A/C for a month while i figure things out. Well it was broken into a bunch of pieces upon arrival. The box it came in is completely smashed and when you shook the box it felt like the machine inside was already broken (which is was). I want this immediately replaced and a NEW one delivered ASAP. I will change my review once a new one is received. Also... i plugged it in and it makes horrible screeching sounds and nothing works. MISSING PARTS AND BROKEN!!!
customer_reviews.author: V1188

customer_reviews.title: This is my second winter and it still works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the type of item that requires reviews after use. My bonus room central air unit failed and I replaced it with this unit. I have never been happier. It has performed well through Winter, Spring, Summer, and Fall. I would recommend fully.
customer_reviews.author: davisg13

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY SO FAR
customer_reviews.text: To date this keeps my room very cool and with the timer and temp control I find the comfort level to be just right for what I needed. It could be a little quieter but it is not loud enough that it keeps me awake or hard to get to sleep. 14,000 BTU's also keeps it from being over worked as it shifts into just blowing cool air until it falls below the temp I programed. WORTH the money so far.
customer_reviews.author: pleazzer

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with dual hose window kit.
customer_reviews.text: You pay the extra money to get an efficient dual hose air-conditioning unit and then they send you single hose window kit. It's going to cost you an extra $100 to buy the correct window kit so factor that into your costs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With This Unit
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd summer with this air conditioner. It is easy to install and cools the living room, rec room and kitchen area of our 1340 sq foot rambler that gets very warm when the temps exceed 80 degrees outside. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Berdie

customer_reviews.title: Sucks after one year
customer_reviews.text: This unit is horrible... worked great the first year and two years later it can barely cool a 400 SF room but is designed for a 700 SF. What a waste of money... I’m finally writing this review because I need to buy a second AC or just trash this one.
customer_reviews.author: LA Jay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit that saved us during the hot summer
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this think pumps out some ac. Excellent unit that saved us during the hot summer. Only complaint is that the kit for exhaust isn’t long enough for vertical placements in windows. Had to buy a kit to properly mount the ac in the window. Otherwise I’d recommend this item to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Southport

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but...
customer_reviews.text: Cools well, but seems like it is inefficient to need to pull in outside air via leakage in home weatherstripping in order to exhaust to outside. Perhaps this could have been designed with an air intake. As my dehumidifier needs to run a lot more to remove the humidity from the air drawn in to keep the pressure equal between the inside and outside due to exhaust. It does keep my basement apartment that is around 580 sq ft cool. But certainly cannot set lower than 72, otherwise causes too much indoor humidity that my dehumdifier cannot remove. I have fans to try to move air around doors as temperature ranges from 72-78 throughout the space.
customer_reviews.author: miketech_79

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and they don't cool off the smallest room. I do love it for the dehumidifier mode, that works great. But it was loud on the ac or the dehumidifier setting. And in order to use the remote you must be standig directly in front of it and no further then a foot away. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Paula Gudzinas

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase, it's terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth even $100, is not effective. You'll have to box up to ship back for refund. Good luck packing this 100lbs unit back. I would not chance purchasing this unit.
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome it cooled my whole big living room in less than 15 mins
customer_reviews.text: I have received this today everything arrived properly packed and It took me and my son to install around an hour Everything in manual was clear on instructions and we were able to cool our living area in less than 15 mins and really hoping it will keep up its performance all through this summer and winter Only reason why I am not giving it 5 as I want to wait on its performance for few more months
customer_reviews.author: KP_LS

customer_reviews.title: Front face ruined with a HUGE sticker that is impossible to remove
customer_reviews.text: The AC works fine, just like you would expect. However, I purchased this one, as opposed other options, due to its looks. But someone had a bright idea to put a massive marketing sticker across the the middle face of the unit. The stick is massive, and once removed, leaves ugly glue marks on the panel. Now I have a beautifully ugly unit. Spectacular. There's no way that I found to get rid of this sticker such that it leaves without marks.
customer_reviews.author: This Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great roll away AC unit
customer_reviews.text: I love this and I own two of them. THE BAD PART IS... check your package when you receive it. These units do not ship well and they REALLY need to improve the shipping box. My first one was damaged when it arrived but it was so darn hot that I kept it. I have an odd shaped small house @700 sq feet and it does take two units to keep it as cool as I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin RInehart

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad they did
customer_reviews.text: These have saved our lives this summer. We live in AZ, and it is brutal out here. Our AC was not working well, so we bought this one and one other. I am so glad they did, so when our AC finally died, we have these until we can get a new one. They work well and are easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Cherish

customer_reviews.title: ItzaBrand New Studio Pc
customer_reviews.text: got this for my new design studio, a great purchase. the way the weather has been, I've def need this air conditioner. I also like the style and color of the unit. really easy to put in. it's​ not that loud, easy to move around. keeps my studio nice and cool with all these windows
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Consumer beware
customer_reviews.text: Very unsatisfied with this unit, cooling unit does not work and unable to get any help from their customer service! I thought that Honeywell was a good and trust worthy company but sadly mistaken. Buyer beware...
customer_reviews.author: Sandra De Leon

customer_reviews.title: great customer support if you have any issues
customer_reviews.text: I had the unit at my special needs sisters apartment nice and cool, not too loud. worked great for 3 years then had an issues with the water tank needing emptied all the time. I emailed Honeywell, Joey in cusotmer service was quick to respond. He gave me clear instructions and got me a replacement under warrenty right away. Very responsive to my emails.
customer_reviews.author: rideteachersnowpro

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken and severely damaged
customer_reviews.text: It was like the package got hit by a car!!! I ordered a replacement and the second one arrived exactly the same. Unbelievable that it was shipped in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: diamondgirl85

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time or money. this thing is extremely loud and didn't pump out cool air for its size like I thought it would. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Not a great investment
customer_reviews.text: I guess California must be a "humid climate" according to Honeywell (it's not humid at all where I live.) After only 50-100 uses over a couple summers, this thing now puts out a smell that is slightly worse than a rotting corpse. Doesn't seem to be a way to clean out the inside of the unit, so I guess it's trash now. Too bad, because it works great other than the horrific smell it puts out
customer_reviews.author: m34josh

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come as advertised - 550 sq. is a reach and 700 is just a fib.
customer_reviews.text: I thought that this unit would do well to cool my 535 sq. foot living room area and I can barely keep the room below 80 degrees. Would definitely recommend a properly sized window unit before considering one of these things. Also have had to put an oscillating fan in front of it in order to try and move what little cool air it does emit around the room. Look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Depew

customer_reviews.title: Keeping a hot sw facing room in Phoenix cool!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my central a/c was on the fritz; it did quit working and had to be repaired in triple digit weather; meantime, had this unit in SW facing bedroom, kept it nice and cool. Now that central a/c is working, still using so using the central a/c less, holding the electric bill lower.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We use this in the basement and it’s been keeping the living room and 2 extra rooms down there at the 68 degrees I have it set at no problem. Little loud but nothing crazy. I was really surprised at how well it works. I’d definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Eric C.

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a dead animal & barely cools
customer_reviews.text: This AC was supposed to be the most powerful one, it's description claims it can cool rooms up to 700sq ft. It cannot. And it smells a dead animal. Internet forums claimed the smell would go away within 48hrs hours. It did not. Had this piece of junk running for a week straight and it never stopped smelling bad. It was a hassle to lug around and then have to repack it. Save yourself the trouble, do not buy this AC!
customer_reviews.author: Santana D Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: 1st Class
customer_reviews.text: The only thing was the left side had popped open removed screws clipped back put screws back all ok , Works very good thanks , I have been in refrigeration for 50 years and I know how good Honeywell is ,I have used a lot of there parts. 1st class. Ray
customer_reviews.author: Ray Jones

customer_reviews.title: works great but would be better if in the heating or ...
customer_reviews.text: works great but would be better if in the heating or cooling mode you didn't need to drain the water about every half hour.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Ward

customer_reviews.title: Underpowered Overweight Disposable Junk
customer_reviews.text: The dehumidifier and heating functions work fine, but this thing can't keep a 12x12 room cool during the summer (in Seattle). Good luck moving this beast on carpet. Ran for one year (primarily using dehumidifier) before the air conditioning section quit working altogether. Now I have to pay to take it to the dump.
customer_reviews.author: D. K. Shields

customer_reviews.title: This unit is to cool 700 sf
customer_reviews.text: This unit is to cool 700 sf., but it could barely cool my 200 sf bedroom. Don’t buy this unit it is a piece of junk. They fool you with fake stories AVOID!
customer_reviews.author: Baubak Bagherpour

customer_reviews.title: The Quality control in the plant or the shipping facility is damaging the equipment
customer_reviews.text: the unit is great in operation . the learning curve is very small. except for the shipping damage, which I was warned about from previous You tube reviews, this unit would be on the top of sales. If this was my company I would seriously check out the delivery end of my business. Customers are turned off by not getting a piece of equipment that is not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: kipsan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and space
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1000 sq foot condo and this machine can only cool the bedroom 11.5’x14.5’. JUNK. I’ve been using this unit since 2018. RUBBISH. “ 10,000 BTU?? Deff not. I’ve owned Arctic King’s from Walmart that cool bedrooms exponentially faster. Don’t waste your money. AND you have to drain the water EVERYDAY to get maximum efficiency from unit. It’s a dehumidifier combo piece of S***.
customer_reviews.author: James Kelly Duncan

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of money I spent on this unit, I am so disappointed. It does not work at all. It states that it can reach up to 700sq ft. That is far from the truth. It’s ridiculous that this much money was spent for nothing
customer_reviews.author: Haley Haarman

customer_reviews.title: Noisy but nice
customer_reviews.text: So far it is a good machine and does the trick. It is less fast in its ability to cool than a similarly powered window machine, but the technology is different and that may simply be the limitations of such. It is noisier than a window machine because all the moving parts are in the house instead of outside the window. It is very useful for those with a need to move the machine from room to room, in other words the casual user who has only the exceptional hot weather to combat. The lack of need to empty a water tray is a fabulous feature and I wouldn't buy one of these without it.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Scott

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: 20 min to unpack, hookup and turn on. Quiet. I expected it to be noisier but it is very quiet. It's been running nonstop for about 1 month now in SW Florida. I bought a bigger unit than was recommended so is just "loafing along" doing a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Does not get cold enough!
customer_reviews.text: This unit does not work as expected. I have had this a/c for a few weeks now and it only reduces the temperate of my room by 10 degrees (its currently 90 outside and my room is 79). I’ll probably end up keeping it since I disposed of the box. I’m very unhappy with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jaron

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cover much space
customer_reviews.text: This AC unit is huge, for taking up so much room it surely doesn't kick out much AC. I can leave it on all day and that's how long it takes to cool off the room. It's soooooo loud! I did have this replaced at one point, the remote never works. It's not something I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: deborah

customer_reviews.title: ... year now with no issues and it work just fine. i have one room upstairs that it heats ...
customer_reviews.text: i have owned this for a year now with no issues and it work just fine. i have one room upstairs that it heats and cools. on really hot days i may need to turn on my window unit to help it out but my upstairs is poor construction on house. its a great unit. just bout another one and waiting on delivery (its a used one from amazon i hope its gonna be ok )
customer_reviews.author: adam hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Cools well but too loud for watching TV nearby
customer_reviews.text: It has worked well since we bought it. My only complaint would be the noise. It's not irritating or unpleasant... I can sleep in the same room with it. It's just too loud for telephone conversations and TV watching in the same room.
customer_reviews.author: AtlantaCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, low noise and powerful AC unit.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good buy for the hot summer. Easy to install and it's relatively quiet, it doesn't bother to sleep. Works great in my 300 soft bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. One wheel was in about 20 pieces when unboxed. I believe it was UPS not Honeywell at fault. Much larger than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Tina L. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Best in class...
customer_reviews.text: Seems some folks had unrealistic expectations based on reviews. It is a room A/C, not a home A/C. I have owned a few of these and the Honeywell is no doubt best in class. I use it to cool my 700sf bedroom when working night shift. It manages the hottest of days, is relatively quiet and although I thought the remote was a gimmick, it is handy. I also love the no drain tub feature. Runs for hours and hours, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not efficient
customer_reviews.text: We have a small fan that does more to cool down space. It’s suppose to cool 700 sq ft but we can only feel right in front of it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Peters

customer_reviews.title: Cools as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is the third portable AC unit I have purchased in the last year but the first of this brand. This one is better than the other two combined and cools as advertised. Waited almost two months after purchasing to write this review hopefully so others will consider the product. Only issue that I did have was the packageing was extremely damaged and the cover was cracked but it did not hinder the unit in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Stevens

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: It's a little noisy when on high speed fan setting, but it does work very well at cooling the room.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGIA CHINADLE

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not get as cold as advertised. Square feet coverage not as advertised. Still works though.
customer_reviews.author: Cassia Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Great portable ac
customer_reviews.text: great ac. lifesaver during summer because my ac unit broke down. a bit noisy though. still very good
customer_reviews.author: John Kim

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't help with radiant heat, loud
customer_reviews.text: 650 sq ft loft, bought this as a desperate attempt to cool it. 90 degree day with this thing running full force remains a 90 degree day in my loft. Would not purchase anything remotely close to this again. This thing is LOUD.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Keeley

customer_reviews.title: it keeps it cool at that temp
customer_reviews.text: We installed this on Thursday, July 19. It has been working non-stop since. When you set the temp. for what you want, it keeps it cool at that temp. So far ,so good. Very nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Ziesemer

customer_reviews.title: This unit is a piece of crap. It quit evaporating the water within the first ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit is a piece of crap. It quit evaporating the water within the first few weeks. Now it doesn't cool at all. This is the first time I have bought a Honeywell ac. I have bought many other manufacturers models over the years and never had issues like this. Do not buy these ac units!
customer_reviews.author: derek hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I advise attaching a garden hose to the outlet for easier draining, but if you set up a schedule to empty it, doing it manually isn't difficult. Also, works well as a dehumidifier (does not provide heat).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not cooling
customer_reviews.text: dozent cooling at all after 3-5 hrs the room not cool enofe i thing it is a refurbishe and i am not happy
customer_reviews.author: tamara  tahalov

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, It has a discharge temp of ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, It has a discharge temp of 48oF in a 75oF room. I also ran a quick test of the heat pump and for the short test I ran it had a discharge around 100oF. I got this to help aid our Central Air which is slightly undersized for our home, and it seems to be helping with the slack.
customer_reviews.author: Redneck_Electrician

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, some parts came damaged missing
customer_reviews.text: Unit works great so far. Slightly concerned as to longevity as it came with pieces chipped and not in the original box. Was also missing the remote
customer_reviews.author: Ian K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I can actually practice with my Golf simulator in my garage without sweating buckets. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael S Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Cleans/filters the air
customer_reviews.text: Much to my surprise, this machine cleans/filters the air in the house much better than my in-window ac. However, it does not get the room as cool as the in-window machine did and it is 2,000 BTU's stronger! We like it anyway
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lousy product
customer_reviews.text: This product is not effective in cooling 700 square feet. On a 90 degree day it cooled it down to about 80degrees. Definitely not worth all the money I spent. I advise would consumers to steer clear of this product.
customer_reviews.author: carmela carroll

customer_reviews.title: This AC even can't cool down my living room to 80 F degree
customer_reviews.text: I live in a two bedroom apartment with total size less than 900 sqft. This AC even can't cool down my living room to 80 F degree! This is very disappointing! The product claims that it can cool down up to 700 Sq. Ft! Obviously this is NOT true!
customer_reviews.author: liyang S. Cheng

customer_reviews.title: We are happy with the air conditioner but very disappointed on how ...
customer_reviews.text: We are happy with the air conditioner but very disappointed on how we received it. The box was split on the right side and the unit was covered in dust when we removed it. The unit has scuff marks on the right side and the bottom of the box was completely gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Up to 700 sf .... ???
customer_reviews.text: This unit doesn’t cool a room of up to 700sf. I am using it in a den that it is a little less than 400sf and the difference of temperature between inside the room and outside of it, it is just a few degrees. A big disappointment with this purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo V

customer_reviews.title: I think I will like this product.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It is my first day with it, because Amazon sent me a used product the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Cortes

customer_reviews.title: Works consistently but I believe the unit does not provide ...
customer_reviews.text: Works consistently but I believe the unit does not provide the full 14,000 BTU cooling output. However, because it is also an evaporative unit, you do not need to empty water from the unit. Saves cleaning up spilled water when draining since water by product is evaporated..
customer_reviews.author: R. L. F.

customer_reviews.title: Works great if you have the space
customer_reviews.text: It's great for the most part. It's just so big and the tubing is huge. It's kinda an eyesore.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Haglund

customer_reviews.title: Shipping bangs them up.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a life saver this summer. Only thing that I was bummed about is a one of the four rollers on the feet was broken. But I’m sure this is a shipping problem. Other than that I would have givin it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good So Far
customer_reviews.text: Purchased off Amazon originally and the thing came beat up and definitely used, despite buying brand new. Returned it and bought through Home Depot, and it's been pretty good so far. I've never had a portable AC so the size kind of shocked me, but I'm hoping for the best!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Multiple problems with multiple units.
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these and the electronics malfunctioned day one. We ordered a replacement and the high setting didn’t work on day one. We returned both products and purchased a completely different brand- Hisense- and couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works great.
customer_reviews.text: Like how cold it gets. Have roughly a 1200 Sg ft house and with a bathroom and two bedroom doors closed, it’s keeps the rest of the house at 70 degrees on a 80 degree day with the sun beating down on the house. Cooling roughly 800+ sg ft and is impressive. Love the payment plan option to.
customer_reviews.author: Dale ray Hendrickson jr

customer_reviews.title: Over all pretty good
customer_reviews.text: A.c. doesn't blow as cold as I was expecting. Heater works good ,but condensation tank is too small and hard to drain. Gets full in about one hour.
customer_reviews.author: josef

customer_reviews.title: Cold Nights Ahead!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best air conditioner that I have ever purchased. Amazon delivered it in perfect shape and we have been cold ever since. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... airconditioner was delivered not only damaged but also smelled like fish!
customer_reviews.text: the airconditioner was delivered not only damaged but also smelled like fish!!!! refused delivery....the driver took it back.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Cool but loud
customer_reviews.text: Cools room very quickly but it's loud we have to keep TV on high.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, very loud
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job of cooling down my home when it's hot out, but boy is it loud! I run it when I'm at work all day, rarely when I'm home unless it's unbearable hot.
customer_reviews.author: Anita K. West

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Cooling after a Year.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first year and then stopped cooling. Possibly a Freon Leak.
customer_reviews.author: 🤗Ovrjoyd🤗

customer_reviews.title: and they work great, so great that I even got one for ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my work, and they work great, so great that I even got one for my home!
customer_reviews.author: Almost Married Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Air conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Way to heavy for us to handle as older people.
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA THOMASON

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Does an excellent job of cooling a pretty large area and noise level is AOK. It sometimes cools the air a couple of degrees cooler than the thermostat setting.
customer_reviews.author: David J Kreiner

customer_reviews.title: Blows cold air but is loud
customer_reviews.text: I've only owned the unit for a day but it was extremely easy to set up and get going. It cranks out cold air and seems like a solid unit. The only con I have about it is that it is loud, that's why I knocked 1 star off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Blow cool air but it is quite loud. NOT recommended for indoor installation.
customer_reviews.author: Disclaimer

customer_reviews.title: Great A/C. Been using for 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: We have owned this unit for 2 years. We use it in our 900 sq ft attic/family room. It is an insulated space, but on hot days it easily 85-90 degrees on a hot day up there. When can keep it 73 degrees with it running. We do have 1 air vent that does feed the space to help too, but this a/c unit makes a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! Definitely been a cool saver for me this summer!
customer_reviews.author: #1Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Cool but not cold.
customer_reviews.text: The a/c is cool, but not very cold since this evaporative technology (which doesn't require a water drain tube) is weaker in cooling power than water drain tube a/cs. The heater is useful in the winter and uses less electricity than an electric heater, as well as exchanging air to the outside with an exhaust tube.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Gabriel Epand

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't cool as well as a window air unit. The connection for the window vent broke easily and doesn't stay in window. Inside the unit is moldy, difficult time cleaning it.
customer_reviews.author: Peperno

customer_reviews.title: Wish they made a 20k btu....
customer_reviews.text: Been running for a month..off only to clean filters. Don't forget one in right rear lower. .
customer_reviews.author: Gary Paulette

customer_reviews.title: Decent unit
customer_reviews.text: Our room is a little large for this unit, but it manages to bring the temp down 4-5 degrees in a very short period of time. Unit is heavy, but has wheels and can be rolled around. Not so easy to just carry down the stairs. It is not quiet, but it does not bother me. over all I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: Honeywell MM14CHCS 4-in-1 Black&Silver Portable Air Conditioner with Thermal Overload Protection - 14,000 BTU
product_meta.description: The Honeywell MM Series portable air conditioner has a sleek, modern design cooling and dehumidifying areas 550-700 square feet. With 3-in-1 technology, this portable air conditioner delivers optimum cooling and dehumidification. It also has a fan-only function. The full-function remote control allows you to operate each feature from across the room. Unlike a fixed AC, this unit requires no permanent installation and four caster wheels provide easy mobility between areas. Plus, the auto-evaporation system allows for hours of continuous operation with no water to drain or no bucket to empty. This MM14CCS comes with everything needed including a flexible exhaust hose and an easy-to-install window venting kit. The window vent can be removed when the unit is not in use.cfm265
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Honeywell MM14CHCS Portable Air Conditioner, installation accessories and remote control.

4-in-1 Honeywell Portable AC with Heating, Fan & Dehumidifier that covers rooms up to 500 sq. Ft with 14,000 BTU. Heats rooms up to 400 sq. ft Automatic vertical wind motion helps distribute powerful cool/warm air evenly for fast & consistent cooling/heating

Specifications: Dehumidifier removes up to 86 pints per day | Adjustable cooling temperature – 61° F to 77° F | Adjustable heating temperature – 60° F to 77° F | Exhaust Hose length – 12" to 47" | Hose diameter – 5” | Window bracket min Width – 20" - 47"
Dual filters designed to protect from dust & hair to extend product life & performance. Filters clean easily under a faucet for easy maintenance
Thermal overload protection for added safety & peace of mind. Dual Dust Filtration extends product life and performance by keeping internal system clean

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars882 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: Limited 1-year parts and labor for unit and 18-months parts for compressor.
specifications.Included Components: Air conditioner with heat pump, remote control, flexible exhaust hose, window venting kit, manual, warranty, casters, window panels
